about_the_game:
Every Day Is Opening Day!


From the creators of Redneck Rampage comes a hunting game that's so real, you'll be expectin' the Game Warden to be checkin' tags! But don't worry, this is All Season, All Weapons, All Thrillin' and Killin' with your helpful local backwoods guide, Leonard.

You'll explore acres and acres of prime habitat, inclduing forest, woodlands, lake, snow park and shooting range - using all your available trackin' skills to follow, find and finish off your prey. Use attractant scent and choose between rifle, shotgun, pistol or crossbow for varying levels of difficulty.

So lock'n'load and git ready for a little Redneck style huntin' fun!

Choice Of Prey

  • Deer
  • Turkey
  • Razorback
  • Duck

Fantastic Firepower

  • Rifle
  • Pistol
  • Shotgun
  • Crossbow

Realistic Perspective

  • Track your game by finding markings and droppings on the terrain
  • Walk the terrain; stalk your prey from the hunter's point of view, not overhead
  • Use attractant scent to find'em and flush'em

Approved By Real Rednecks

  • Starring Burton Gilliam as Leonard
  • Display your kill in the Redneck Trophy Room
  • Wear sleeveless camo t-shirts
  • Hunt, Hunt, Hunt!

When it comes to huntin' real good, who gets more action than a redneck?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM, OpenGL compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB of video memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended two-button mouse, or Apple mouse with Secondary Button / Secondary Click enabled.

name: Redneck Deer Huntin'

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

esrb.descriptors: (with Animated Blood and Gore, Strong Language)

short_description: Deer hunting, redneck style! Join Leonard, a redneck native, and do your hunting four different animals (deer, duck, razorback, and wild turkey) in 8 acres of wilderness with different weapons in Redneck country. This is hunting with attitude!
